content.rendered:
How do you evaluate your staff?
#1 Answer:
Measure their performance!
The JCG Performance Tracker™ is a funeral customer survey and sales contract analysis benchmarking program. It is a complete solution designed specifically for the funeral business that gives you the most insight into both customer satisfaction and sales contract analysis by arranger, location and company.
Are you ready to start measuring your results at your Funeral Business?
There is no better place than the  JCG Performance Tracker™. You can begin tracking performance today with no contract to sign and a low monthly cost. Call Johnson Consulting Group today and get started now. You have nothing to lose except customers and sales! Let our JCG Performance Tracker™ put you on the path to accountability with your staff!
